questions.question: How do you turn dynamic mode on and off for reader feature types already on the canvas?
options: The Merge Feature Type checkbox on a reader feature type
Right-clicking the reader feature type and checking/unchecking Dynamic
Finding the reader in the Navigator and setting the Feature Type Definition Mode under Parameters
Adding a DynamicModeSetter transformer connected to the reader feature type

questions.question: Which of the following is not a component of schema as defined in FME Workbench?
What is the purpose of the Schema Sources parameter on a writer feature type in a dynamic translation?
options: To define the encoding of the output dataset
To define the destination path where FME will write the data
To define where the writer will obtain the destination schema
To manually define a fixed schema

questions.question: Adding a reader as a resource will cause FME Workbench to read all that dataset's features, impacting performance as much as adding a regular reader.
